issue_date.title: Issue Date
issue_date.description: When the new corrective invoice's issue date should be set to.

stamps.title: Stamps
stamps.description: Stamps of the previous document to include in the preceding data.

credit.title: Credit
credit.description: Credit when true indicates that the corrective document should cancel the previous document.

debit.title: Debit
debit.description: Debit when true indicates that the corrective document should add new items to the previous document.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Human readable reason for the corrective operation.

correction_method.title: Correction Method
correction_method.description: Correction method as defined by the tax regime.

corrections.title: Corrections
corrections.description: Correction keys that describe the specific changes according to the tax regime.

CorrectionOptions.description: CorrectionOptions defines a structure used to pass configuration options to correct a previous invoice.
